markers.name: supply #1
markers.description: First supply crate at the Gate entrance, easy to grab but exposed to anyone watching the approach.

markers.name: supply #2
markers.description: Supply crate inside a second-floor room to the left side of the Gate, offering safer loot with decent cover.

markers.name: supply #3
markers.description: Crate located inside the main Dormitory building, a solid stop while clearing rooms for loot.

markers.name: supply #4
markers.description: Another supply crate within the Dormitory interior, often chained with nearby crates for efficient looting.

markers.name: supply #5
markers.description: Dormitory crate placed deeper inside the building, rewarding players who fully clear the structure.

markers.name: supply #6
markers.description: Supply crate inside the L-shaped Dormitory building, ideal for route-based looting runs.

markers.name: supply #7
markers.description: Crate inside a room at the Dormitory tunnel entrance, often contested by players rotating into the tunnels.

markers.name: supply #8
markers.description: Supply crate inside the C-shaped Dormitory building, useful for stacking loot before pushing out.

markers.name: supply #9
markers.description: Another crate inside the C-shaped Dormitory building, easily chained with #8 and #10 for efficient clearing.

markers.name: supply #10
markers.description: C-shaped Dormitory crate positioned slightly deeper inside, rewarding careful room-to-room pushes.

markers.name: supply #11
markers.description: Open-area crate at the Launch Silo, offering fast loot but leaving you exposed to long-range sniper fire.

markers.name: supply #12
markers.description: Another Launch Silo open-area crate, best looted while using nearby cover and constant movement.

markers.name: supply #13
markers.description: Launch Silo supply crate placed in the open, risky but efficient for quick rotations through the area.

markers.name: supply #14
markers.description: Crate in the exposed Launch Silo grounds, vulnerable to elevated sightlines and hidden snipers.

markers.name: supply #15
markers.description: Launch Silo open-area loot point, rewarding aggressive teams controlling the central ground.

markers.name: supply #16
markers.description: Another open Launch Silo crate; secure the perimeter before looting to avoid getting beamed.

markers.name: supply #17
markers.description: Exposed Launch Silo crate positioned near high-traffic lines of sight, ideal for bait plays.

markers.name: supply #18
markers.description: Crate on the Launch Silo grounds, a common stop for squads rotating between river and central area.

markers.name: supply #19
markers.description: Supply crate inside Locked Door #B, accessible only with a Black Password Letter and offering guaranteed high-tier loot.

markers.name: supply #20
markers.description: Another crate inside Locked Door #B, stacking even more high-tier loot for those who invest the password.

markers.name: supply #21
markers.description: Third crate hidden behind Locked Door #B, turning this vault into a massive payday if you get in.

markers.name: supply #22
markers.description: Crate inside a room at Launch Silo near the frozen river, offering good loot with moderate risk.

markers.name: supply #23
markers.description: Supply crate inside the Dispatch Center building, a key stop while clearing this high-value structure.

markers.name: supply #24
markers.description: Another Dispatch Center crate, often looted alongside nearby weapon and file cabinets for maximum value.

markers.name: supply #25
markers.description: Crate tucked deeper inside the Dispatch Center, rewarding full building clears.

markers.name: supply #26
markers.description: Dispatch Center crate positioned toward the far side of the building, good for late rotations.

markers.name: supply #27
markers.description: High-value crate inside the Dispatch Center protected by a boss, risky but very rewarding if you clear the area.

markers.name: supply #28
markers.description: Supply crate on the frozen river near Dispatch Center, exposed and easy to third-party.

markers.name: supply #29
markers.description: Frozen river crate closer to Launch Silo, often hit by squads rotating between central and side lanes.

markers.name: supply #30
markers.description: Crate located in a small room near the Warehouse, a good warm-up loot spot before pushing inside.

markers.name: supply #31
markers.description: Supply crate inside a container outside the Warehouse, offering quick loot with limited cover.

markers.name: supply #32
markers.description: Crate on the first floor of the Warehouse, part of a dense cluster of high-value loot.

markers.name: supply #33
markers.description: Another first-floor Warehouse crate, ideal when sweeping the entire level with your squad.

markers.name: supply #34
markers.description: First-floor Warehouse crate positioned near the edges, good for quick grab-and-go plays.

markers.name: supply #35
markers.description: High-risk Warehouse crate on the first floor, guarded by a boss and perfect for stacked loot runs.

markers.name: supply #36
markers.description: Ground-floor Warehouse crate, useful when fighting through the lower level first.

markers.name: supply #37
markers.description: First-floor Warehouse crate positioned near the edges, good for quick grab-and-go plays.

markers.name: supply #38
markers.description: Ground-floor crate in the C-shaped building near the Warehouse, a solid mid-route loot point.

markers.name: supply #39
markers.description: First-floor crate in the C-shaped building near the Warehouse, rewarding vertical control of the area.

markers.name: supply #40
markers.description: Crate on the walkway along the wall near the Warehouse, exposed but along a common rotation path.

markers.name: supply #41
markers.description: Supply crate inside a military tent, offering quick loot with limited hard cover.

markers.name: supply #42
markers.description: Crate inside Locked Door #A, accessible with a Black Password Letter and packed with guaranteed high-tier loot.

markers.name: supply #43
markers.description: Second crate inside Locked Door #A, further boosting the value of this black-door vault.

markers.name: supply #44
markers.description: Third crate inside Locked Door #A, turning this small room into a jackpot for prepared squads.

markers.name: supply #45
markers.description: Ground-floor crate inside a building near the Factory, useful for topping up between fights.

markers.name: supply #46
markers.description: First-floor crate in a building near the Factory, offering slightly safer loot above ground level.

markers.name: supply #47
markers.description: Another first-floor crate in the nearby building, ideal when sweeping the entire structure.

markers.name: supply #48
markers.description: Supply crate inside a Factory server room on the first floor, offering great loot in a tight, defensible space.

markers.name: supply #49
markers.description: Crate on the Factory first floor, commonly picked during full building clears.

markers.name: supply #50
markers.description: Crate inside a first-floor Factory room, rewarding methodical room-to-room clearing.

markers.name: supply #51
markers.description: Ground-floor Factory crate, often looted during close-quarters fights inside the building.

markers.name: supply #52
markers.description: First-floor Factory crate, good for squads holding the high ground.

markers.name: supply #53
markers.description: Another first-floor Factory crate, positioned deeper inside for players who commit to the push.

markers.name: supply #54
markers.description: Ground-floor Factory crate along common rotation paths, often looted mid-fight.

markers.name: supply #55
markers.description: Supply crate inside a Factory server room on the first floor, combining tech loot with close-range combat potential.

markers.name: supply #56
markers.description: Another first-floor server room crate in the Factory, ideal for high-value looting in a confined area.

markers.name: supply #57
markers.description: Crate inside a room near the Gate, useful for quick re-supply before heading deeper into the map.

markers.name: supply #58
markers.description: Another indoor crate close to the Gate, offering safe early-game loot with minimal exposure.

markers.name: Weapon #1
markers.description: Weapon crate outside the C-shaped Dormitory building, great for arming up early before pushing indoors.

markers.name: Weapon #2
markers.description: Weapon crate inside a military tent at Launch Silo, offering guns with moderate cover.

markers.name: Weapon #3
markers.description: Another weapon crate inside a Launch Silo military tent, ideal for gearing a second teammate.

markers.name: Weapon #4
markers.description: Weapon crate placed in the open Launch Silo area, rewarding quick grabs but punishing slow looters.

markers.name: Weapon #5
markers.description: Weapon crate inside a container in the Launch Silo open area, offering slightly better cover than ground crates.

markers.name: Weapon #6
markers.description: Weapon crate inside the Dispatch Center building, great for arming up before challenging nearby bosses.

markers.name: Weapon #7
markers.description: Weapon crate on the Warehouse first floor, guarded by a boss and ideal for high-power loadouts.

markers.name: Weapon #8
markers.description: Another boss-protected weapon crate on the Warehouse first floor, rewarding teams that clear the encounter.

markers.name: Weapon #9
markers.description: Weapon crate on the Factory first floor, boosting your firepower during indoor engagements.

markers.name: Weapon #10
markers.description: Weapon crate inside a military tent near the Gate, perfect for early-game loadouts before rotating in.

markers.name: Weapon #11
markers.description: Weapon crate inside a room near the Gate, offering safer weapon pickups for cautious starts.

markers.name: File Cabinet #1
markers.description: File cabinet inside the Dormitory building, useful for gathering documents and extra valuables.

markers.name: File Cabinet #2
markers.description: File cabinet inside the C-shaped Dormitory building, often looted alongside nearby supply crates.

markers.name: File Cabinet #3
markers.description: File cabinet inside a room at Launch Silo near the frozen river, offering extra sellable items.

markers.name: File Cabinet #4
markers.description: File cabinet in a side room of the Dispatch Center building, great for quick document grabs mid-run.

markers.name: File Cabinet #5
markers.description: File cabinet deeper inside the Dispatch Center, often paired with nearby supply and weapon crates.

markers.name: File Cabinet #6
markers.description: Another Dispatch Center file cabinet, adding extra value to full-building clears.

markers.name: File Cabinet #7
markers.description: File cabinet inside the same building that houses the password door near the Warehouse, making this room even more rewarding.

markers.name: File Cabinet #8
markers.description: File cabinet in a Factory server room on the first floor, combining cash loot with technical gear.

markers.name: File Cabinet #9
markers.description: File cabinet inside a room near the Factory, good for quick side-looting during rotations.

markers.name: File Cabinet #10
markers.description: File cabinet in a room near the Gate, offering extra income for low-risk early runs.

markers.name: File Cabinet #11
markers.description: File cabinet inside a room at the Gate itself, perfect for quick hits before heading into the base.

markers.name: Black Password Door #A
markers.description: Locked room inside the Radiation Zone that requires a Black Password Letter to open, rewarding you with guaranteed high-tier loot once unlocked. ℹ️ Only one black door, either #A or #B, will be active per match.

markers.name: Black Password Door #B
markers.description: Hidden inside the Radiation Zone, this vault also requires a Black Password Letter and offers guaranteed high-tier loot once breached. ℹ️ Only one black door, either #A or #B, will be active per match.

markers.name: Laptop #1
markers.description: Located within Radiation at Factory, Only 1 laptop is available within the radiation randomly per match. Laptop may or maynot available here.

markers.name: Laptop #2
markers.description: Located within Radiation at Dispatch Center, Only 1 laptop is available within the radiation randomly per match. Laptop may or maynot available here.

markers.name: Boss #1
markers.description: Infected boss with pistol - Located at the Dispatch Center, in a downside room.
